original_title: Decision taken for scrutiny of 2022 (2023) GCE (A/L) exam papers by next week: Exams Dept.
original_body_lines: The Examinations Department has taken initial steps to launch the scrutiny of 2022 (2023) GCE Advanced Level (A/L) answer scripts immediately, Commissioner General of Examinations H.J.M.C. Amith Jayasundara said.
He said the department had decided to hold a special discussion of the controlling inspectors at the department on April 24.

Accordingly, the scrutiny of the 2022 (2023) GCE (A/L) answer scripts has been scheduled to be held by next week for the following subjects: Hinduism, Christianity, Hindu Culture, Arts, Dancing, Eastern Music, Carnatic Music, Western Music, Drama & Theatre and Hindi.

Meanwhile, the practical examinations relating to 2022 (2023) GCE (A/L) examinations have been concluded and immediate steps have been taken to conduct the practical examinations on Dancing (local), Dancing (Bharatha) and Eastern Music immediately. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
